article_title: Health Focus: Lawyer says forms allow parents access to children's medical info

article_metadata.description:
Recent media accounts about a Rhode Island family having difficulty obtaining medical information about their son's eventually fatal substance-abuse problem struck a chord with Providence lawyer Parish Lentz.
He sees the story of the Goldners as an opportunity to raise awareness among parents that they can take steps to have the legal right to medical information about their adult children.
Hasbro CEO Brian Goldner, and his wife, Barbara, recently went public with the story of their son,
